column.name: ID
column.remarks: Unique identifier

column.name: FK_USER_CREATOR
column.remarks: The user who created this asset

column.name: VERSION
column.remarks: The version of the Taproot asset

column.name: FK_BITCOIN_TRANSACTION_OUTPUT_GENESIS_POINT
column.remarks: The first outpoint of the transaction that created the asset (txid:vout)

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: The name of the asset

column.name: META_DATA_HASH
column.remarks: The hash of the meta data for this genesis asset

column.name: ASSET_ID
column.remarks: The asset ID that uniquely identifies the asset

column.name: OUTPUT_INDEX
column.remarks: The index of the output that carries the unique Taproot commitment in the genesis transaction

column.name: GENESIS_VERSION
column.remarks: The version of the Taproot commitment that created this asset

column.name: ASSET_TYPE
column.remarks: The type of the asset: normal or a collectible

column.name: AMOUNT
column.remarks: The total amount of the asset stored in this Taproot UTXO

column.name: LOCK_TIME
column.remarks: An optional lock time, as with Bitcoin transactions

column.name: RELATIVE_LOCK_TIME
column.remarks: An optional relative lock time, same as Bitcoin transactions

column.name: SCRIPT_VERSION
column.remarks: The version of the script, only version 0 is defined at present

column.name: SCRIPT_KEY
column.remarks: The script key of the asset, which can be spent under Taproot semantics

column.name: RAW_GROUP_KEY
column.remarks: The raw group key which is a normal public key

column.name: TWEAKED_GROUP_KEY
column.remarks: The tweaked group key, which is derived based on the genesis point and also asset type

column.name: ASSET_ID_SIG
column.remarks: A signature over the genesis point using the above key

column.name: ANCHOR_TX
column.remarks: The transaction that anchors the Taproot commitment where the asset resides

column.name: ANCHOR_TXID
column.remarks: The txid of the above transaction

column.name: ANCHOR_BLOCK_HASH
column.remarks: The block hash the contains the anchor transaction above

column.name: ANCHOR_OUTPOINT
column.remarks: The outpoint (txid:vout) that stores the Taproot commitment

column.name: INTERNAL_KEY
column.remarks: The raw internal key that was used to create the anchor Taproot output key

column.name: MERKLE_ROOT
column.remarks: The Taproot merkle root hash of the anchor output the asset was committed to. If there is no Tapscript sibling, this is equal to the Taproot Asset root commitment hash

column.name: TAPSCRIPT_SIBLING
column.remarks: The serialized preimage of a Tapscript sibling, if there was one. If this is empty, then the merkle_root hash is equal to the Taproot root hash of the anchor output

column.name: CREATED_ON
column.remarks: Data created on

column.name: UPDATED_ON
column.remarks: Data updated on
